thread.title: Passengers gain clearer glimpse of New Street | Central
thread.title_full: Passengers gain clearer glimpse of New Street | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Passengers gain clearer glimpse of New Street | Central
text:
Many of the hoardings surrounding the eastern end of the New Street have been removed meaning travellers can now see some of the shops.
New Street gleaming in the early morning sunlight. Credit: Network Rail The newly developed parts of the station are opening from Sunday.
Last updated Fri 18 Sep 2015 Read more 4 updates Birmingham New Street's grand opening Travel birmingham West Midlands Birmingham New Street
